reason.raw: Prefer a cleaner solution without to duplicate all the code
reason.html: Prefer a cleaner solution without to duplicate all the code

description.raw:
This script is able to work with directories for 'software-release' which use a directory layout based on directory-per-distribution instead of branches.

Is basically the same as debbuild but using the new layout for multidistributions ([see the gazebo example](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo-release/pull-request/5/support-to-host-multi-distributions-in-the/diff))
description.html:
This script is able to work with directories for 'software-release' which use a directory layout based on directory-per-distribution instead of branches.

Is basically the same as debbuild but using the new layout for multidistributions (see the gazebo example)

title: New debbuild to support multidistribution
